titleStmt.title: The holy genealogie of Iesus Christ both his naturall line of fathers, which S. Luke followeth, chap. 3, and his kingly line, which S. Matthew followeth, chap. I, with fit notation of their names / by H. Br.
titleStmt.author: Broughton, Hugh, 1549-1612.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W. White, dwelling in Cow-lane,
